definition: to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss

sentences.english: Dates become a series of business negotiations, often hard-nosed.
sentences.chinese: 约会成为一系列商务谈判，常常就像讨价还价。

sentences.english: The negotiating groups have developed consolidated legal text in virtually all negotiating groups.
sentences.chinese: 谈判小组在几乎所有的谈判中均已完成法律文本合并。

sentences.english: The negotiating groups have developed consolidated legal text in virtually all negotiating groups.
sentences.chinese: 谈判小组在几乎所有的谈判中均已完成法律文本合并。

sentences.english: "There is no talk of capitulation, everybody's really happy, " he said.
sentences.chinese: “没有任何妥协的谈判，每个人都非常高兴”他说到。

sentences.english: Let me begin with the negotiations on the intermediate-range nuclear forces that are currently under way in Geneva.
sentences.chinese: 让我先谈谈正在日内瓦进行的关于中程核力量的谈判。

sentences.english: I suggest that you keep off political issue in negotiations with them.
sentences.chinese: 我建议你在与他们谈判时避开政治问题。

sentences.english: Ssangyong says it is in the initial stages of talks with potential strategic investors.
sentences.chinese: 双龙称，正与潜在战略投资者进行初期谈判。

sentences.english: We are willing to negotiate with them as long as there are no pre-conditions.
sentences.chinese: 只要没有前提条件，我们愿意与他们谈判。

sentences.english: One option is to shift trade facilitation from a negotiation to a development plan.
sentences.chinese: 一种方案是将贸易便利化从谈判转变为发展计划。

sentences.english: The department is now collecting public comments on a number of negotiated rules.
sentences.chinese: 教育署目前正收集许多有关谈判规则的公众意见。

sentences.english: The related sides should make greater efforts along the path of negotiation.
sentences.chinese: 有关方面应在谈判的轨道上做出更大的努力。

sentences.english: Eagleburger says the U. S. can try to persuade the North Koreans to come back to the negotiating table.
sentences.chinese: 伊格尔伯格说，美国有能力试图说服北韩重返谈判桌。

sentences.english: Phytosanitary, which shows the characteristics of both public goods and technical rampart, is a significant part of Negotiation on Agricultural Multilateral Trade.
sentences.chinese: 动植物检疫是农业多边贸易谈判的重要议题之一。

sentences.english: Many of the obstacles facing the Doha negotiations are political.
sentences.chinese: 多哈谈判面临的许多障碍都是政治性的。

sentences.english: A city that parleys is half gotten.
sentences.chinese: 与敌人谈判的城市，等于一半被占领。

sentences.english: We are anxious that the same mistake is not repeated in the current round of negotiations.
sentences.chinese: 我们殷切希望在新一轮谈判中不要重犯同样的错误。

definition: to consult/to discuss seriously/to negotiate/to confer/negotiations/consultations
to confer/to discuss/to engage in talks
to discuss a matter with sb/to get in touch with/to arrange
to consult with/to talk things over/agreement
